docs.text: Welcome to the Flanker help pages Find the latest release on GitHub https://github.com/wtmatlock/flanker Link to paper Coming soon What is Flanker? Flanker is designed to allow you to easily extract flanking sequences of genes (e.g. AMR/virulence genes). These flanking sequences are exported as FASTA files to allow easy downstream processing to integrate into any pipeline you may wish to use. Aditionally flanker allows you to cluster these sequences using Mash. Bugs/feature requests Please report/request these using the 'issues' tab on the Flanker GitHub page (above)

Welcome to the Flanker help pages
Find the latest release on GitHub

docs.text: Flanker is designed to allow you to easily extract flanking sequences of genes (e.g. AMR/virulence genes). These flanking sequences are exported as FASTA files to allow easy downstream processing to integrate into any pipeline you may wish to use. Aditionally flanker allows you to cluster these sequences using Mash.
